prompt_base: photorealistic portrait of an emaciated Indian ascetic, visible bone structure, ceremonial red face paint, skull necklace, serene expression, 8k cinematic photo, natural sunset lighting
feature_prompt: aged weathered skin texture, prominent bone structure, rough paint texture on face, intricate skull detail, sharp focus, dry skin
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, vibrant colors, fat face, smooth skin, blood, wounds, gore, injured, healthy, youthful, muscular, too much flesh
